column4: hi , my friend install ubuntu dual boot with window 7 and her window 7 wont work , it says boot loader corrupted. i search through internet and it only teach how to fix ubuntu boot loader only , anyone can help me?
Maybe that version of the bootloader (grub?) isn't recent enough to recognize Windows 7? I'm not too sure how the bootloader detects existing OSs, though.
, erm , but it is window 7 problem , ubuntu done fine with boot loading
So the error is after Windows has started booting? I don't know, then. I haven't gotten a chance to try Windows 7 yet (although I've heard great things about it)
